1.content:
Crossover Scenario Choices!

Fullmetal Alchemist/Batman - Post-Brotherhood while Ed is on the train juuust after proposing to Winry...Truth contacts him with a deal to offer. Go to another dimension and 'assist' a certain caped crusader and upon landing in Gotham his alchemy and lost limb will be restored! No strings attached really! How will Ed manage in the far more technologically advanced world and amid a sprawling cityscape of crime and gothic setting?

The Grand Line meets the Caribbean - Something strange has happened, the world of One Piece has changed. The Grand Line has merged with the sea of the Caribbean and vastly different pirates from different worlds are set to collide!
(Takes place pre-timeskip of One Piece and during the events of Dead Man's Chest)
1.title: The Beginning...

choices: Ed Gets His Bearings and Explores Gotham City
11.content:
Edward was riding the train that had just departed from the station in Resembool. For the first time in a long while he was genuinely happy and had not a care in the world. That is until he took notice of something strange.

At first he thought the train had merely stopped, but upon looking out the window he saw a bird frozen in mid flight.

"What the hell...?" Ed turned to the other passengers and saw they were all frozen in time as well. Standing up out of his seat, Ed was on his guard until a familiar voice declared within his mind: "Edward Elric...."

"Truth?! What do you want? I didn't perform Human Transmutation!" Ed snapped angrily, though he was unsure how Truth was doing this...just how powerful was the otherworldly being?

"I have a proposition for you...come." Truth's voice echoed, and with that Ed found himself in Truth's domain standing before the grinning 'deity'.

"Alright..what gives?!" Ed clenched his fists.

"Calm down, I wanted to make you an offer to get your alchemy and limb back."

Ed's eyes widened but he was still suspicious, "I'm not going to do it...if I can have Al then I don't care about alchemy or a lost leg."

"Alphonse is out of the equation, he's irrelevant to what I'm offering." Truth assured the blond.

The Fullmetal Alchemist crossed his arms and fixed the entity with a glare. "Go on..."

"There's another dimension if you will...where alchemy is nothing more than mere myth. In it's place humanity has advanced technology far beyond what you've encountered. I know your little brother was a fan of those little colorful books that depict costumed heroes...sold at newspaper stands."

Ed raised an eyebrow, "You're telling me I need to go to a place with superheroes? Where there's no alchemy? Get real!"

It was all too much to believe...but he'd already seen so much that would fit that category...it was quite confusing.

"If you accept, I will send you to this place with your leg and alchemy returned. There's one individual who I think you'd get along with quite well. You are to assist him in any way you can." Truth still wore that toothy grin of his.

Ed sighed, "Fine...but for how long?"

"Don't worry, time will remain still in your world." Truth explained.

Truth lifted its hand and a sphere appeared that appeared to be completely see through. It floated over to Ed and showed him visions of a young wealthy boy named Bruce Wayne who watched as his parents were shot dead in an alleyway in front of him.

The boy undertook extensive training and taught himself every science known to man, it wasn't unlike Ed's situation with their own Teacher.

The boy soon grew into a man who donned a frightening costume and dealt out justice to the corrupt and the underworld of Gotham City.

With a snap of Truth's fingers, Ed found himself gone from the void..and in a vast foggy city that held buildings taller than any Ed had ever seen, with advanced vehicles going down the streets.
11.title: FMA/Batman Crossover!

112.content:
Ed took in his new surroundings, jaw open at the new dark and industrialized city. He seem to be at the entrance of some alleyway.

Ed found himself jumping as a loud roar rang out on the road passing him. The loud mechanism lacked a roof and had a group of young teens laughing as they speed down the street. The alchemist concluded that the mechanism must be a car.

"Truth was right, the technology is more advanced not to mention LOUD!"

A strange feeling came as Ed had jumped from the noise. Pulling up the trunk of his pants, Ed stared stunned as just as promised his organic leg had return. Slowly, he unconsciously backed into the alleyway while getting use to having his legs again. Truth was serious in his bargain, so that means Ed must be able to do alch-!

"A little late to be dancing bud."

Ed was brought out of his thoughts as a raspy voice called out. From the deep darkness of the alleyway a sluggish man came out with a smug grin, spinning a pocket knife. Ed immediately put his guard up as he felt the hostile intent spew out. The man stopped his spinning and pointed his knife at Ed.

"Ok bud give up what you got. No noise or resistance or I'll skew you like a fish!"

Ed frowned, this definitely wasn't how he wanted to get introduced to this new world. Then again from what Truth told him about Bruce Wayne, criminal activity must be a recurring problem.

"Hey don't keep me waiting, empty those pockets!", The mugger moved his knife closer intill it was a inch from Ed's neck.

"Sorry, let me give you something.", Ed said before he suddenly delivered a hard kick and throwed the mugger back with a grunt.

Never a better time to try his restored alchemy then now, Ed quickly clapped his hands and placed them on the ground. The familiar crinkle of energy occured and Ed grinned as the ground morphed into a staff.

The mugger growled as he recovered and brandished his knife charging at the alchemist. Ed swiftly dodged and striked the man in the back with his created staff, making the mugger fall face first into the alley wall.

Just as the mugger got up and readied another strike, a sudden spinning blur struck his head making him groan before falling down unconscious.

Ed stared surprised before looking at the source of the blur. Up on the roof of the building stood a figure, it's cape flapping as the white eyes looked at Ed. The figure leaped down and landed in the alley, having the build of a muscled man and dressed in a black bat like costume.

"That's Bruce Wayne, that's Batman!"

Batman glanced at Ed before walking over to the mugger and tieing him up. The hero soon turned to Ed with a apathetic face.

"You put up a strong fight against him, are you a meta-human?"

Ed smiled. "Not really...but I can tell you this. My name is Edward Elric and I was wondering if we could talk?"
112.title: Ed's Welcome to Gotham City

choices: Batman Knows Ed's There (Because he's Batman!)
1121.content:
Batman grunted, it wasn't clear whether this was in agreement to Ed's request or not.
'
"Uhh...yeah...so this is going to sound crazy but a certain uhh...'friend' of mine sent me here to help you." Ed awkwardly stated.

"I don't need help, certainly not from a stranger." Batman gruffly refused as he pushed past Edward and went to grapple onto a building. The Alchemist didn't like how the vigilante was ignoring him like this, it made him feel...small.

So as The Batman shot out his grappling hook and swung up onto a rooftop, Ed was right there on street level tailing him.

Edward noticed a bright light being shone onto the cloudy sky, it had the outline of a bat symbol. Ed smirked, all he had to do was go to the rooftop where this spotlight was being emitted...and he's pretty sure that was where Bats was heading.

Batman landed on the Gotham City Police Department's rooftop where the recently installed Batsignal was shining from. Next to it stood a ginger haired and mustached man in glasses and a brown trench coat. Commissioner Gordon was smoking a cigarette when he noticed the dark figure approaching.

It had begun to rain and Ed crouched on the fire escape as a raindrop dripped from his blond bangs.

"Our mutual friend certainly isn't shy..combined with the theatrics and wacky appearance I'd almost say he's trying to outdo you." Gordon said, Batman clearly didn't find it funny.

As Ed peeked over the edge of the rooftop, he saw Gordon produce a joker playing card in an evidence bag.

"Each victim had one of these on or somewhere near their bodies. The newspapers got wind of it and have taken to calling him The Joker."

"We've got security detail at Henry Cladridge's house, he's his next target." Gordon took a drag on his cig.

"Any changes?" Batman asked.

"No...same old announcement that his target will die at midnight. If the last two are anything to go on...he's not going to just stroll up to the front door."

"The last two victims were poisoned with some kind of unknown chemical. You should've seen the bodies...it's messed up." Gordon sighed.

"What do you mean?" Batman asked, they were desperate for clues.

"Whatever he poisoned them with appears to be something he made himself. Witnesses said that the victims just started laughing uncontrollably...most likely suffocated from lack of air. The bodies are still smiling."
1121.title: A Chat with a Bat

11212.content:
Gordan was about to continue when Batman suddenly looked to the side of the roof.

"Show yourself.", the dark knight commanded in a firm voice.

Ed widened his eyes at being discovered and sighed before climbing onto the roof top. Gordan narrowed his eyes at the stranger, a curious figure with long blond hair and golden eyes. The stranger walked over and the commissioner tensed up before Batman shot him a look that reassured him that this wasn't someone hostile.

"You followed me?", Bats asked as he turned to Ed with his hard stare.

The alchemist scratch his head. "Yeah, it wasn't that hard to find you...with the sign and everything.", Ed soon held a firm face. "I'm serious about before, I came here to help."

Gordan blinked as he looked between Batman and the blond stranger. "Wait...are you a vigilante too?"

Ed shook his head. "No, I'm not a superhero or anything. But I did work for the military and can help you with whoever's doing these sick crimes."

"You were in the military, when?", Gordan said blowing out a puff of smoke.

"I was offered a spot when I was twelve.", Ed explained.

Gordan nearly dropped his cigarette and despite his empasive face, Batman did feel shock at the statement.

"I know a lot of things, so I can help you!", Ed said now walking until he was in front of the two.

Next...
11212.title: Meeting Ed

112121.content:
"Fine...but I have one rule: No killing. Do you understand?" Batman asked very strictly.

Ed nodded and grinned, "I won't have any problems following that."

Later, at Henry Cladridge's estate...

Edward, Batman, Gordon and Detective Harvey Bullock were in the living room of the Cladridge manor. Henry himself sat in an armchair twiddling his thumbs nervously.

"His targets seem 'ta be random...what's this crazy's deal?" Bullock asked roughly.

"Influential people...from high up Gotham's social class." Gordon said as he rubbed his chin.

"They have no connections other than the fact that they'd get a lot of attention...He even announces what he's going to do." Batman stated.

The phone in the corner rang, startling Mr. Cladridge. Gordon picked up the phone and answered it, "Hm? It's uh...it's for you.." Gordon handed the phone to Cladridge.

"Wh-who is it?" Cladridge asked warily.

"Your secretary at the bank..." Gordon stated. Mr. Cladridge was a banker, and he appeared relieved when it wasn't that horrible Joker person.

"Oh! I'd love to talk to someone...even about my work!" Henry rushed over to the phone and practically yanked it out of Gordon's hands.

Batman stood by Cladridge, as did Ed...everyone was on guard.

"Hello?" Henry asked. He suddenly jolted, causing everyone to jump slightly. "Ow..."

"What's wrong? Mr. Cladridge?" Ed asked warily.

"Ehh..he..hehehehhe...hehehheehhehhehe...hahahahaha..hahaahahahha!" Henry started giggling uncontrollably as Batman grabbed him to prevent him from falling on the floor.

To everyone's horror, Henry's eyes bulged and tears streamed from his eyes as he had an unnaturally large grin on his face as he kept laughing.

"GET THIS MAN TO A HOSPITAL!!" Batman roared as the laughter slowly stopped and Cladridge went still.

"Is...is he..?" Ed asked in shock. A sudden jovial and maniac laughter came from the telephone which had been cast aside.

"HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA! OOO HOO HOOO HOO! HELLO? HELLO OPERATOR!? I BELIEVE MY PARTY'S BEEN...DISCONNECTED! AHAHAHAHAHHAHAHHA!" The Joker's voice cackled before the dial tone was heard after he hung up.

Batman went over to the telephone and saw a tiny needle poking out of one of the holes in the receiver.

"There's some sort of needle in here..." Batman pointed out.

"But that doesn't make sense! I answered it and I didn't get injected with anything!" Gordon roared in frustration.

"It must've been rigged to only come out from the vibrations of Henry's voice." Batman stated.
112121.title: Partners

1121211.content:
Bold = Creator9's work

Ed struggled to look away from Henry's distorted face as he laid still on the floor, chest no longer moving as he's breathing stopped. The alchemist's pupils shrunk as the memories of the abomination created from his and Al's human transmutation attempt rose up. Both distorted faces were frozen onto dead bodies.

The feeling of a weight on his shoulder made Ed blink and finally look away to find Gordan placed a hand on his shoulder. The commissioner looked at him with concern but kept quiet as he brought Ed over to batman.

Ed cleared his throat. "Just...what injected Mr. Cladridge?"

Batman narrowed his eyes at the needle sticking out of the phone. "From the samples gathered it appears to be a toxin of sorts. It appears to overload the laughter functions of the brain and makes it's victims laugh intill they can't breath."


"Someone would've had to plant it in there...." Edward observed.

"Bullock I want you to go downstairs and interview the staff. I wanna know who was in here!" Gordon ordered the detective. "Should I tell them what happened?" Bullock inquired.

"No, they might clam up if they find out why you're asking. If one of the staff did it, then its possible the others are in on it. Treat them as suspects." Gordon said as Bullock left the room to go downstairs.

Before Edward's eyes Batman's 'gauntlet' opened up and Bats slid the tiny dart inside a sort of scanner within. "Alfred, I'm sending you a scan of the toxin...can you identify?" Batman said this in hushed tones away from the other two...but Edward wasn't fooled.

This 'Alfred''s voice on the other end replied from the gauntlet's speaker: "Oh my...this appears to be a type of poison that directly attacks the victim's nervous system. What's more, is that the recipe as it were could be made using something as easily accessible as what you'd find in a janitor's closet. He must have some form of background in chemistry to be able to produce something like this..."

"Can you make an anti-toxin?" Batman asked. "Right away, sir." Alfred replied before the communication ended.

Gordon was looking out the window uneasily, "That ice cream truck has been loitering out there since we arrived..."
1121211.title: Continue I

choices: Devilman and My Hero Academia crossover
13.content:
Here are some more scenarios~

Devil Hero

After the battle with Satan, Akira Fudo finds himself in a new realm entirely. One not full of demons but heroes and villians. Stranded in this new world, Akira will lend help to it's inhabitants while trying not to lose himself to his demonic side and dealing with the antics of class 1-A.

The Eve of Fairy Tail

What if Mahiru found Kuro when he was a child? What if he found a strange hole in a tree that led him and Kuro into a strange new world full of wizards and extraordinary things, such as a guild that take the boy and his cat in.
13.title: More Scenarios

choices: Godzilla vs King Kong vs Yours Truly.
133.content:
Destroy All Monsters Special Edition.

In this special edition of Destroy All Monsters yours truly a heroic giant animated anthropomorphic saber tooth tiger teams up with Godzilla and company in order to stop King Ghidorah and the evil Kilaaks.

Godzilla vs King Kong vs yours truly.

What if yours truly was to take on Godzilla and King Kong? In this story it'll be a three way battle between the king of the monsters, the 8th wonder of the world and yours truly a heroic giant animated anthropomorphic saber tooth tiger.
133.title: Open Slot 1

choices: My Hero Academia meets DC Comics!
1333.title: Open Slots.

choices: Stay with Avengers Point of View
133313.content:
=New York Sanctum=
Sanctum Sanctorum​

Doctor Strange had just returned from a long day of work.

Ever since the Ancient One had passed, Strange had taken up the mantle in becoming the Sorcerer Supreme.
He constantly worked on a regular basis of studying new spells, obtaining knowledge on the multiverses and so on, and committing to the many duties as a Sorcerer Supreme.

And that was a shitload.​


Fortunately, each day, he always had a chance to relaxe in his cozy establishment he immediate grew fond of.
The first place he ever faced a battle as a Wizard of sorts and obtained his strange, peculiar item: His cloak.​

=Avengers=​

"Give me a rundown..." Steve promptly interrupted, settling the mild panic from Tony; though it could be considered more of excitement than concern, and the far more increased panic from Banner.

The two basically speaking words of scientific analogies that Steve unfortunately didn't understand. Hence his request to reassess, in English.

Banner seemed to far fetched on the idea of simplifying whatever magnitude this was, but Tony seemed far more compensating. Sarcastically.​


"Shits about to go down." Tony simplified with that typical charismatic sarcasm, but his face was far more contorted to seriousness...like usual. "In a matter of seconds from now..." he snaps his finger, "All this shit is gonna be mashed into another universe..",
"Dimension" Banner corrected,​
"Universe, dimension, all the same shit. It's gonna a** &@¶£ our dimension, and become one. So all this...." He spreads his arms out, "We'll be sharing it with our next best neighborhood"!

Banner then cut in, using his glasses that were folded neatly within his grasp as a pointer, "And that's if..." He pointed his glasses all about the room, "...all of this stays intact. Stable. Our universe might not even be able to handle this...convergence".

Steve, pressing his fingers against his mouth as he leaned back against a desk with his other arm crossed and supporting the other, motioned his hand as he inquired, "So how do we stop it"?

Steve barely understood, but he understood enough. However his initial thought of preventation was no likely feat.

Tony took a deep breath, and with his deadpanned, concerned face, looked at Steve with unfortunate news.
"We can't...."​

Steve pinched his brows and straightened his posture, his stance far more stern, "There must be a way Tony." Unresolved with the solution that nothing could be done.
Tony shook his head, Banner reaffirming, "We can't Rogers...it just doesn't work that way".

Steve shook his head this time, "There's always a way. What about Doctor Strange?" He asked, Tony giving a slight chuckle of amusement, "Oh, you mean the Wizard? He's probably off doing Wizard shit, besides, even if he knew, he would have been here by now or way before yaking our ear off about some Multiverses crap and how it's getting threatened".

"So we contact him." Steve urged, "We call him....ask him, figure this out" his eyes drew to Banner again, almost pleading for such possibilities, but Banner shook his head again. "Even if we did..." With a slow pause, Banners face shifted into unwavered worry, fear, and acceptance, "...We wouldn't make it in time".


Steve shook his head, "So why all this. Why the chat!" he pressed, drawing his stern features of mixed desperation with frustration to Tony, "So I could warn"?
Tony's face nodded, feeling the weight himself, "Yeah..." He finished, backing away as his face drew farther to the ground, full of disappointment,
And regret.​

"Let the cards fall..." ​

Suddenly, the shift had occurred.....​


The world on both sides began to change, twist, contort into strange proportions that were exactly as stated.
Merging....​
First, the air grew stale and still before the sudden sensation of a rumble reverberated and shook the world like it was merely about to rupture.
Fragile constructions such as glass began to shatter from all the quivering, cascading upon the ground and bouncing as it broke into fine grains. It's material becoming a blanket of dust that moved along with the shaken earth.

Things slowly began to appear, such as buildings, strangers, plants, cities, life. Everything combined into one and almost everything that appeared that hadn't been there...or existed, before, had just made a nice squeeze. It almost fit perfectly....
Though it wasn't meant to. ​


The universe and world shifted into a new entity, but all awareness of what once was had still resided, but the additions would leave distortion and confusion.
A slow adjustment into the merge and shift of the Multiverses.

Two places becoming one....​
133313.title: Both Universes Combined!

choices: DC-verse merges with My Hero Academia-world!
Class 1-A ends up in DC Universe?!
13332.title: My Hero Academia meets DC Comics!

133322.content:
Class 1-A didn't know what happened, they had just heard that they for the most part had passed the Hero License Exam...but then something strange happened.

A bright flash of light enveloped the students of Class 1-A....and they fell unconscious.

"Urrg...my head...." Todoroki murmured as he held the 'cold' side of his forehead and sat up. Opening his eyes he would see his classmates were all laying on plain white hospital beds..and were just starting to wake up too.

The room appeared like something out of a science fiction movie, high tech monitors and such were showing the students' life signs beside each bed.

Kaminari stretched and yawned loudly, "Maan...that was some nap! ...Wait..where are we?" He asked as he looked around.

The group were all still in their hero costumes just as they had been during the exam...but as each student awoke they had the same question.

"Uhh...guys....look over here." Kirishima said as he pointed out the window.

"So what? It's dark outside now? We must've been out for..." Jiro commented before everyone gathered around the window and saw the starry sky...as well as a familiar blue orb.

"Wait...." Uraraka murmured. If they were able to look out a window and see the planet Earth then that meant they....

"IS THAT EARTH!!? THEN WHERE ARE WE?!!" The students yelled in unison.

"Oh maaaan! We've been abducted by hot alien babes!!! Ohh the horror!" Mineta cried out in false alarm.

"THAT'S what you're thinking about, Mineta?" Tsuyu deadpanned.

"Alright! Whoever's kidnapped us it don't matter! Cause I'm blasting us outta here!" Bakugo prepared to blast open the window.

"WAIT! WE'LL GET SUCKED OUT INTO SPACE, KACCHAN!" Deku wailed.

"He is right, that wouldn't be wise." A soft and calm voice stated from beside the class.

Everyone turned their heads to see a strange green skinned man with red eyes lacking pupils smiling slightly at them.

"Greetings...I am the Martian Manhunter...you may call me J'onn J'onnz...or simply Jon." The apparent martian greeted them politely.

"ALIIIEN!" Uraraka wailed as she fainted away on the floor.

"I must ask you where we are and why we are here! I am Tenya Iida class rep!" Iida declared authoritatively.

"You're seriously going to just up and ignore the whole 'martian' thing?" The other students deadpanned.

"We did not bring you here against your will, I assure you. You fell out of a strange portal that opened down on Earth..you were all unconscious so we thought it best to bring you here for examination." J'onn stated.

"You probed us didn't you?!!" Kaminari yelped.

"Gross!" Mina cried out.

"No...we merely placed you here after determining you had no life threatening injuries." J'onn replied calm as ever.

"So who is we?" Kirishima asked.

"And WHERE is here?" Momo inquired.

"Of course, we as in the Justice League....a team of heroes who tackle threats to Earth that would otherwise be insurmountable alone."

"You are currently in the infirmary of the Watchtower...which acts as Justice League HQ...floating above Earth."
133322.title: Another World, Different Heroes

1333221.content:
Everyone looked back out the widow at earth as the scope of everything was settling in. A new world, and everyone's first experience is being in space at the headquarters of this world's heroes.

J'onn smiled. "When you are ready everyone will be waiting to greet you. Intill then, I hope you find your stay here pleasant."

After the Martian left the room, class 1-A held a silence even Bakugou had a look of concentration.

"Well I think it be best if we meet with this world's heroes.", Iida said adjusting his glasses. Kaminari scratched his head nervously.

"I don't know, what if we're not getting the full truth. What if we were really abducted?!"

"K-kaminari please don't panic I'm sure Jon-kun wouldn't have been so nice if he had any bad intentions.", Izuku quickly spoke.

Izuku's words did seem to calm everyone down a bit. There was still a fear though, as Mineta was shivering in his thoughts and Kouji was fiddling with his fingers. Tsuyu was helping Urakaka recover from her faint spell. Bakugou suddenly let out a grunt as he marched towards the door.

"Alright I'm going to chat with this league, if they intend to screw with our asses then I'll blow thier asses the fuck up!"

Izuku yelped as Bakugou exited the room, palms smoking. Before running after him. "KACCHAN, wait we need to make a good impression!"

Seeing as two of their classmates were now heading off, everyone followed and prepared to meet this Justice League.

Walking through the futuristic halls, everyone eventually walked at an even pace to ensure they could introduce themselves at once. Izuku, Bakugou, and Todoroki walked near the front with Iida and Kirishima close by. The sound of adults talking soon reached their ears as they walked into a open room with a large monitor and a colorful group of superheroes.

A tall well built man in a blue and red costume with a large S on his chest soon took notice of the class. He seem to be the leader and gave a friendly grin before his colleagues took notice as well.

"Hello, it's good to see your all well. It was quite the scene when you all arrived."

Izuku's eye's scanned the hero. His mind was racing as flashes of All Might occured at the sight of the man. Spandex costume and cape, large built, American colors. Wait was All Might American? Did he take inspiration from someone, did this hero as well? Oh was his quirk the-!"

The greenete blinked as Iida tapped him on the shoulder. The heroes in front of him were looking at him confused and his classmates had a knowing look. Izuku's face turned red as he realized he'd mumbled all his questions. A sudden gust of wind hit Izuku as a man in a red spandax suit with a lightning bolt suddenly appeared before him looking concerned.

"Is he ok?"

Iida furiously nodded. "Ah yes, Midoriya simply has a habit of mumbling. I must say your quirk seems similar to mine."

The speedster suddenly vanished before appearing next to Martian Manhunter. "Hey J'onn what's he mean by quirk?."

Class 1-A were surprised to say the least at the question. Bakugou clenched his teeth. "Oi why the hell you acting like you don't know what a quirk is?"

"If you could explain what this quirk is your talking about is, then we can settle down.", a black man in a green and black costume said seriously.

Uraraka now fully awake slowly stepped forward. "It's um...the name of superpowers where we come from."

The leader nodded in appreciation at the round faced girl. "Thank you for informing us. Now how about we make introductions to ease the air ok?"

"As J'onn explained we are the justice league, my name is Superman."

Izuku hesitantly rised his hand getting a nod from Superman. "Umm...is your qui-power super strength?.

Superman nodded. "Yes one of my abilities is super strength, though I can show you the other later.", the hero smiled as Izuku eagerly nodded.

The greenete felt new excitement, he could fill out more pages of his notebook. Heck he could maybe start on a new analysis book! Smiling Izuku turned to the hero next to Superman, walking forward and introducing himself in a gruff voice.

"My name is Batman."

Everyone felt a chill at the dark hero's voice. Izuku nervously smiled. "I-if you don't mind me asking, what's your power?.

"I don't have any powers.", Batman replied in a second.

Izuku's eyes widened at that. A hero with no power was alongside the top heroes of this world. He remembered before he inherited One For All and how not having a quirk made him a source for ridicule and pity. He never heard of a quirkless hero yet one was right in front of him. Possible scenarios ran through Izuku's head, could he had been a hero like Batman?
1333221.title: Different Heroes

13332211.content:
The black man with the black and green costume spoke, "I'm John Stewart, Green Lantern of this space sector."

You could hear a pin drop after Stewart said that, he looked at them seriously:

"You...don't know about the Green Lantern Corps?"

"Should we have?" Uraraka asked shyly. "Long story short, they're basically a galactic police-force with members ranging from all different species and races across the universe. The Ring I'm wearing is the source of my power...it allows me to make hard constructs of anything I can imagine."

Green Lantern held his hand out and a green shape emerged attached to the ring, a baseball bat and ball. "Whoaaah!" Izuku and the others said.

"It's all fueled by willpower." Stewart bragged as he sent the hard construct away.

Next up was the only female appearing on the team, "I am Wonder Woman, Amazon princess of Themyscira."

"Themy-...what?" Kirishima asked, Mineta and Kaminari were ogling the so called Amazon.

"It's the home of my people, an island of all female warriors." Wonder Woman smiled.

The girls of 1-A swooned, "Sounds like paradiiise...." Jiro said.

"Yeah!" Mineta and Kaminari agreed.

Flash introduced himself, and then...
13332211.title: Meeting the League

133322112.content:
With the Justice League introduced, Iida decided it be best if him and the rest of class 1-A introduced themselves as well. The blue haired stepped forward and gave a quick bow.

"Hello my name Iida Tenya! We are class 1-A of U.A high school and I am the class rep. I thank you for offering us your hospitality Justice League, please allow us to introduce ourselves.", Iida hand robotically gestured to Izuku who blushed nodding.

"Oh! My name is Midoriya Izuku, ....thank you for having us.", Izuku gave a quick.

Seeing Izuku's intro Bakugou smirked and pointed at himself. "Names Bakugou, I'm gonna be the number 1 hero outta these extras!"

The Justice League was concerned at this notion but 1-A either sweatdropped or laughed at the ash-blond's behavior. Soon everyone began feeling more positive and introduced themselves. Kirishima proclaimed Superman's manliness which got a grin out of the hero, the League was pleasantly surprised at the various characters in front of them.

Mineta introduced himself while ogling at Wonder Woman. "Mineta Minoru...very tall..and shaped right."

The warrior tilted her head at the grape headed boy. "Interesting, I wonder how a child ended up with a group of young adolescents?"

Mineta gaped as he felt his manly hood shatter, before being carried back by Denki. Tokoyami introduced himself next, though he felt his eyes widened as he studied Batman closely.

"His...dark form it's uncanny. What instruments of darkness does he carry, are Dark Shadows levels on par with his?"

"Your friend hasn't moved since he looked at me, is he alright?", Batman asked as he looked from the bird headed boy to his class. Before anyone could elaborate, a small dark bird head with glowing eyes peaked over Tokoyami's shoulder and surprised the heroes as it spoke.

"Your dark form intrigues him.", Tokoyami broke from his thoughts as he noticed Dark Shadow speaking his thoughts. Batman's gaze remained the same and Tokoyami quickly looked off.

"This...is my quirk Dark Shadow. The darkness surrounding you...is impressive.", Tokoyami quickly went back to the group as he could feel his beak heat up.

One of the last to introduce themselves was Kouji. The rock boy was nervous as is meeting new people, now he was meeting heroes from a new world.

Seeing the nervous look on his face, Jirou was about to introduce Kouji before he surprisingly touched her arm and shook his head. Stepping forward, Kouji brought his gaze up.

"I-I'm....Koji Koda. My quirk.....let's me co-command animals.", the large boy slowly spoke. He'd rather sign but he didn't want the potential embarrassment of finding out the heroes couldn't understand him.

The boy was relieved when the majority of heroes gave him a welcoming smile. Batman seem to change his posture so he supposed that was a good sign.
133322112.title: Meet Class 1-A

1333221121.content:
"Kal-El..." A voice echoed from thin air throughout the Watchtower.

"Uh...did everyone else hear that?" Jiro said as her earphones twirled.

A hologram of a man appeared before them, "Do not be alarmed, I am called Jor-El...I am the one you Earthlings refer to as Superman's biological father."

"Uh..your dad's a ghost?" Kirishima asked curiously.

"In a manner of speaking...I am an artificial copy of Jor-El's consciousness." Jor-El stated with a slight smile.

"I thought you could only interact with me back on Earth in the fortress.." Superman stated as he looked at Jor-El.

"Whoa you have a fortress?!" Izuku blurted.

"It's a long story but...Supes is from another planet that when his folks found out it was going to explode...sent him to Earth in a spacecraft that landed on a farm in the state of Kansas." Flash explained.

"A Kryptonian's cells grow supercharged under Earth's sun...the sun is the source of his powers." Wonder Woman stated.

"Whoa...but...you keep using the plural....what do you mean-" Izuku was already scribbling in his notebook.

"He can shoot lasers from his eyes, freeze things with his breath, lift over 400 tons...is pretty invulnerable even to bullets." Green Lantern listed them off.

"I think you should all hear this...." Superman interrupted as he brought them over to Jor-El.

"A brief time before Krypton's destruction my best friend thought the best way to save Krypton was to stage a violent coup and wage genocide against what he called 'degenerative bloodlines' that were to blame for Krypton's failures. He formed a radical terrorist group known as the Sword of Rao...he along with two others were arrested and charged with high treason."

"My friend was a Kryptonian general...called Zod. He was assisted by two others, a woman called Ursa and a large brute known as Non. Non was so violent and uncontrollable that Krypton's high council ordered him lobotomized before trial."

"I took pity on my former friend and rather than see him executed...I arranged for his life to be spared and for him to be imprisoned in the Phantom Zone."

Class 1-A was as puzzled as the Leaguers. "The...Phantom Zone?" Mineta asked fearfully.

"It is a void dimension far removed from space and time. Nothing exists there and it is an empty wasteland where Krypton sent only its most heinous criminals."

"Why are you telling us this?" Todoroki asked suspiciously.

"Because it appears that whatever event brought you and your friends here...has had the disastrous side affect of freeing the three of them. Under Earth's yellow sun..their powers will match that of my son's." Jor-El warned.
1333221121.title: New Threat

13332211211.content:
All of class 1-A looked in shock at the proclamation, whatever brought them here also freed these foes of Jor-El and seem to be packing a large powerhouse. The feeling of tension was high both for the students and adults as the threat yet to come set in.

Bakugou tched as he rose a fist. "Alright I wanna know who's the asshole behind all this!"

Jor-El remained calm and gave a thoughtful look. "I'm still uncertain of the circumstances, however I've been able to detect a strange energy affecting the natural wavelengths in space. It not only tore open a hole to your dimension but it also created the exit for Zod and his colleagues. It's only a matter of time before they cause havoc."

Superman gave the hologram of his father a serious look. "We'll be ready to defend earth when the time comes."

"You can count us in!"

Kirishima came forward and wrapped a arm around Bakugou's shoulder, the ash-blond growled but strangely didn't throw him off. The red haired boy's sharp grinned shined as he looked at the league.

"You can count on 1-A to help in this fight with this...Zod guy!"

Tenya looked down while adjusting his glasses anxiously. "K-kirishima-kun that's a little rash..."

The heroes looked at each other at the proclamation. Flash rubbed his head. "You have great enthusiasm kid...but we don't want to pull you into something so dangerous-"

"It's ok!", Uraraka perked up smiling. "We faced off against villians and despite the trouble we didn't stop."

"We're training to be heroes...so we can't just back down from someone who want's to destroy innocent people!", Izuku looked up and said determined.

The heroes were surprised, these teens were ready to defend a new world despite the obvious danger. Superman grinned as he walked forward and laid a hand on Izuku's shoulder. The greenette saw a flash of All Might at the caped heroes heroic look.

"Thank you, all of you. I have to warn you the challenges you face will be hard but if your determined then welcome to the league."
13332211211.title: Forces Come Together

133322112111.content:
Batman, WonderWoman and Superman were the ones who were going down to Earth with the more combat proficient students of 1-A. Their focus would be on combating the villains directly.

Lantern and Flash would focus on rescuing the bystanders and escorting them to safety.

On the screens before them used to monitor the situation, they saw the trio of Kryptonians wreaking havoc on a city that Superman was familiar with.

Smallville, Kansas, USA. Clark's hometown.

"Alright everyone, get on one of these platforms and you'll be teleported down." Manhunter explained.

"Whoa! Teleportation!?" Midoriya was geeking out, though probably not as much as Mei Hatsume would at all this new tech.

"Try to stay together or at least with one of us." Wonder Woman warned, Class 1-A nodded.

They all gathered on the tele-pads and a bright light engulfed them followed by a sensation akin to falling.

Then they found themselves all on a main street through Smallville's business district.

1-A was of course dazed at first...but the screams of innocents and the sight of several fires and demolished buildings snapped them into focus.

Batman was wearing heavy armor that looked like a truck could hit it and bounce off.

"Kal-El!" A voice called and the group saw the three individuals who had caused all this chaos. A bearded individual stood there smirking, Zod.

"Zod." Superman said as he calmly walked forward.

"I see you know of me. I am General Zod, this is Ursa and Non. I apologize for the intrusion...but you appear to have yet to have taken the initiative yourself." Zod smirked.

"Initiative for...?" Superman raised an eyebrow.

"Creating a New Krypton in this primitive squalor of course." Zod chuckled as if it was obvious.

"What about the people who live here...?" Superman demanded, fists clenched.

"What about them?" Ursa snidely replied.

"The foundation for any society has to be built on something....even your father understood that." Zod smirked cruelly.
133322112111.title: Kryptonian Encounter

choices: Sebastian bribes Ciel with a video-game console...Ciel begrudgingly agrees
134.content:
It had been many many centuries since Ciel Phantomhive became a demon and Sebastian Michaelis was forever bound to serve the eternally youthful earl.

In late 2018 Funtom had set up a new headquarters in America. Ciel while a lover of tradition, felt the need to at the very least change locales after a few hundred years.

Funtom was already established in America and a new mansion was built discreetly via Sebastian's magic. However, the new servants were a tad off-put by the young boss' dislike and refusal of technology.

No wifi, no cell phones, no computers whatsoever. The servants were quite shocked at the seemingly young lad having such an aversion to modern tech.

What's more, the boy was strict and seemingly possessed the intellect and business acumen well beyond his appeared years.

The maid was required to wear what was essentially a Victorian era maid's uniform.

The servants were required to leave their cells at home or at least with Sebastian. If they had a call to make they would use the ancient antique phone.

Needless to say, the young head of Funtom not having a cell phone or email address left him quite frustrating to deal with to potential business partners. Sebastian had no doubt his master had missed out on many potentially lucrative opportunities due to his stubbornness.

So one evening after his master had been put to bed...Sebastian recruited the other servants to assist with setting up wifi and helping him purchase a high end laptop and making all of Ciel's paperwork 'digital'.

By the next morning, Sebastian wheeled in the young demon's morning tea and opened the curtains. "My lord..it is time to wake up."

Ciel yawned and stretched a bit, Sebastian was expected to give Ciel his morning paper and prepare the tea.

However, what Ciel got instead was a smartphone with a news app opened.

Sebastian had a very basic idea of how the things work...it paid to keep up with the times...regardless of his master's refusal to.

Though Sebastian had met with someone who could 'tutor' his master in the finer things of computers...and if Ciel didn't want to play ball...Sebastian knew his master was curious about those video-game things.
134.title: Black Butler: A New Era

1342.content:
"S-sebastion what is this!", Ciel demanded awkwardly holding the phone. Sebastian hummed as he momentarily excited the room and came in with a large box that said apple on it.

"My lord while your devotion to tradition is desirable, I'm afraid it has hindered the potential of your business. So I have taken it upon myself and the servents to modernize the Funtom corporation.", Sebastian explained as he began to set up the contraption on his master's desk.

Ciel red eyes widened at the words. "You WHAT!"

The servent simply hummed as he looked over the manual and within a few seconds began to assemble the computer. Soon the IMac was assembled. Sebastian turned to Ciel who had dropped the phone and was staring irritated at him. The butler however smiled as he walked to his master.

"My lord I didn't just intend to modernize the buisness. If I recall when we where out you took quite the interest in those video game consoles."

Ciel's angry soon subsided as he remembered the devices. He seen children holding them in their hands and much larger ones in shelves. The earl's interest was peaked with them and made him consider adding some technical practices to his corporation.

"Arg...fine I will try these new buisness practices, after you purchase me one of these consoles!"

Sebastian grinned and bowed. "As you wish my lord."

After getting dressed, Ciel began making his way to the dining hall to have breakfast. After being seated by Sebastian the door opened and another servent came out with a cart of dishes. The servent was a shortish teen with spiky blond hair, with two spikes resembling that of cat ears.

"Here is your breakfast my lord.", the servent timidly said bowing.

Sebastian rubbed the spiky head and got a purr in return as a sudden pair of cat ears popped out of the boy's head. "Well done Nelson, you've adapted to this duty well."

Nelson was one of the new servents to Ciel. A cat demon without a master who was taken in by Sebastian, luckily he didn't trigger any allergies with the earl.

"Nelson please lower your ears." Ciel ordered getting a nervous apology out of Nelson before he hurried back to the kitchen.

After breakfast the earl and butler made their way to the city. Ciel couldn't help but get a sense of astonishment as the tall building rose into the sky and the modern cars drove down the street. Even after settling in America for years the scope of everything still was a garner for attention. Soon they arrived at a store with multiple cardboard cutouts set up in front with colorful characters.

"Honestly who dresses like this?", the earl spoke as he passed the cutouts and entered the store.

At the cash out desk sat a young man, long bleached hair under a beanie and a piercing in his nose. He took his attention from his phone as the two walked up his desk, blinking at the attire of the two before clearing his throat.

"Uh...what can I help you with?"

Ciel took a quick glance around the store. "I've come to purchase a...video game console."

The cashier fiddled with the ends of his hair. "Well what kind of console? We've just got in the shipments of Xbox 1's if your looking for that."

Ciel narrowed his eyes. "Is that the best you have?"

The cashier was looking weirdly at them now. "Some will say so... but look kid I've only played on the Switch so I can't give you what's the best."

"Well then, I'll have this X...box, and I want to play games that will test my strategy."

The cashier soon stood and made his way to a aisle across the store. Soon he came back with a green box and a stack of book like cases. The one on top read Call of Duty and beneath it read Halo, the last one made Ciel squint as he thought of beings with halos.

"Ok so these are what I could find. From what my friend said you need a good amount of strategy to play this."

"Thank you for your time Glenn.", Sebastian said as he gave the appropriate money and began leaving with Ciel.

Glenn gapped at the two. "H-how did he know my name?! Oh wait I'm wearing my nametag."
1342.title: Solving Issues With A Console

choices: Time to go to Best Buy!
13421.content:
The demonic butler and master duo were soon back at the manor and Sebastian was unpacking the Xbox One as Ciel sat in a nearby armchair sipping tea.

The other servants peered around the corner into the sitting room. "Are we finally embracing how we're living in the year 2019?" A bronze skinned maid sarcastically inquired. This maid was Elinda, or Elen for short. She was a fierce female demon known as a succubus. She had a fiery temper and flirtatious nature and was sort of Sebastian's second-in-command. Her outfit consisted of a rather revealing version of a traditional maid's outfit.

Oh! Also she frequently hits on Sebastian...much to Grell's chagrin whenever the scarlet reaper turns up.

The servant in charge of the gardening was a young human boy who had freckled cheeks and sandy hair. His name was Trevor and while he appeared normal, he was exceptionally gifted in terms of what humans considered psychic abilities. This included telepathy, telekinesis, and of course being able to sense someone's aura and tell if someone wasn't exactly entirely human or not.

"Wow....an Xbox One!" Trevor rushed into the living room.

Ciel blinked, "You're familiar with this...console?"

"Yes sir! I have one of these and a Playstation 4 at home." Trevor explained.

"Then I suppose I should leave the setting it up to you." Sebastian said as he relinquished the confusing machine to the young gardener.

"Okay! I'll set it up for you!" Trevor enthusiastically saluted.

A short pause later and Trevor seemed to be looking around the room for something. "What is it?" Ciel asked curiously.

"Well....did you purchase a High Definition TV? You can't play it without one." Trevor said with a nervous chuckle.
13421.title: Ciel Loves Games

134212.content:
Ciel and Sebastian soon stepped out of the mansion and started making their way to the store Trevor recommend they get the T.V from.

The earl was slightly fuming as the irratation from having to wait longer to play the games he envied. Muttering "about why you needed to waste money on something that just looked better" while Sebastian looked amused.

From the door the servents watched thier lord and his butler walk out of sight. Elen held a ice bag to Trevor's ear as he cringed at the ringing. Ciel certainly hadn't been happy or calm about the news.

Nelson walked in holding a basket of clothes. "Oh did lord Phantomhive go...Trevor are you ok?"

The freckled boy chuckled as flicked a finger and made the doors shut. "Heh, yeah just a little peeved he can't play his games."

The catboys ears twitched as Trevor took the ice bag and winced again. Elen sighed before looking amused.

"Lighten up boys, before we know it the earl will start feeling the modern tech. It'll then, it's back to work!"

Nelson quickly nodded and hurried off with the laundry. Trevor however pouted and leaned into the ice.

"Aww but I'm still feeling the aftermath of Ciel's anger. Can't I take a break to strea-"

Trevor soon felt a spike in emotion and gawked as a loud CRACK sounded out. Looking over, he saw Elen had a glowing red whip unraveled with a smirk.

"We can have a break later Trevor, don't make me beg~"

The psychic quickly nodded and ran off with a "yes miss!", and off to the garden. Elen released the whip as it faded away before following the two.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ciel grumbled as they walked through the numerous aisles of this Best...Buy. He and Sebastian had been looking for the appropriate T.V and with all the different ones all small and as thin as paper, it was difficult.

Sebastian had offered up the proposition of asking a employee for help. Ciel was stubborn as he stated that it wasn't neccessary, though that was ten minutes ago.

A female employee with a short ponytail was placing various items on display when she saw the well dressed boy and his...guardian passing through each aisle. As they passed by she cleared her throat.

"Um...excuse me.", Ciel and Sebastian turned to the employee. "Do you need help looking for something?"

Ciel was going to decline, when Sebastian stepped forward and placed a hand on his chest. "Ah yes, thank you for offering your services. Me and my lord are in search for a television that is high definition."

The employee lightly flushed at the voice, before shaking her blush. "Oh um...yes right this way please!"

Soon the earl and butler were brought over to a section and offered a variety of choices. The employee was confused that that they desired a T.V best suited for a Xbox, but soon gave the suggestion for the LG OLED C8. Ciel was confused at the name but quickly rushed to make the purchase as he wanted to play his games.

Sebastian thanked the employe and surprised her as he effortlessly lifted the box and walked to the check out.
134212.title: Time To Go To Best Buy!

1342121.content:
"Alright then, let's try this again." Sebastian said as they arrived home with the television and placed it down in front of Trevor.

Ciel sat down in his armchair with a sigh as Trevor set the tv and Xbox One up for his master. "I suppose you can show me how to operate it and how the games work as well." Ciel said to Trevor as he took a sip of tea.

"Of course, my lord." Trevor nodded, rather excited to share the world of gaming with the lad.

"Your normal duties are finished for the day, yes?" Sebastian interjected. Trevor nodded, Sebastian looked pleased that the young human wasn't neglecting his duties to just play around.

Soon everything was hooked up and Trevor 'psychic-ed' some of his favorite games for Xbox One from his home using his powers.

A few of them dropped into a neat little pile before Ciel, who picked them up and examined them. "Daemon's Souls? Odd name.." Ciel smirked as he looked at the case.

"It's really challenging...but fun...if you want to try it out?" Trevor suggested.

Ciel...
1342121.title: A Lesson in Gaming

13421211.content:
Ciel chuckled as he picked up the controller. "Trevor, I've never been one to back down from a challenge."

Trevor scratched his cheek. "Um...my lord your holding the controller upside down." The psychic quickly turned the right way as Ciel widened his eyes and cleared his throat.

"Yes...anyway show me how this game works.', the earl ordered.

"Ok, so you play as this undead guy and oh! The world was ruled by dragons once!"

After explaining the general premise, Ciel followed Trevor's basic instructions and began playing. He was intrigued by the castle design and how he could movie the character by simply moving the joint stick.

Soon Ciel was facing off against enemies and felt a rush as he hacked the sword. Ciel smirked as he knocked the enemy off the ledge before jumping across.

However the armored man didn't reach the ledge and soon feel. Ciel watched in surprise as the man hit the ground and bold red letters read.

You Died

Suddenly Ciel found his character back at the start of the castle. A castle he has spent 20 minutes on.

"What just happened?"

Trevor ohh and rubbed his head. "Man that sucks, guess you gotta start over."

Ciel huffed before starting again. Later, the earl found himself facing off against two large knight. Ciel continued to attack but soon he was down and the familar words appeared.

The earl gripped his controller intill he shook, before taking a breath. Trevor watched with worry as at Ciel's fifth try he was gritting his teeth in anger as he charged the knights. Drawing the dragon's greatsword

"Grrrhh let the power of the dragons destroy YOU!", Ciel was almost standing up as the large knight slammed his shield down and the armored man layed still with the words popping up again mockingly.

You Died

"BLOODY HELL, yes I know I've died thank you!", Ciel was feeling what modern gamers called rage.

Trevor was holding a pillow in front of him as he worried about Ciel's anger. The next thing he'd expect was a controller to be flung at the screen.
13421211.title: Challenge With A Bit Of Rage

choices: Ciel and Trevor Take on the Boss!
Sebastian Comes in to Call Ciel to Bed?!
134212113.content:
"Um...you know if you want I can bring my controller and we can tackle it together?" Trevor suggested..lowering the pillow only to pale as he saw Ciel's chilling gaze. "Why...didn't you say that in the FIRST PLACE?" The boy said through gritted teeth.

"Not that I need your help or anything..." Ciel quickly corrected himself as Trevor summoned his controller from home with his psychic powers.

A few moments later Ciel and Trevor's characters were on the same 'server' as it was called, and Trevor was helping his employer out in finding his way through the unforgiving game.

"Alright through here we'll find the boss." Trevor explained as the two characters were stopped at a strange looking portal.

Ciel raised an eyebrow, "Boss?"

"They're sort of really powerful enemies that guard the entrances to the next part of the game. They're a lot tougher than the regular enemies you've faced so far." Trevor stated.

"Really? You humans sure are gluttons for punishment...you concoct 'games' like this and make them frustrating normally?" Ciel asked half-joking.

"Eh...like you said, people love a challenge." Trevor chuckled as the two characters went through the portal.

By this time Elen and Nelson were peeking around the corner. "He really seems to be taking to it..." Nelson whispered to her.

"Shouldn't you be in the kitchen?" Elen asked dangerously.

"W-well you're out here!" The catboy hissed back.

"I've already completed my duties for the day." Elen said rather haughtily.

"Well...so have I!" Nelson replied back.

"If you're going to eavesdrop..I'd prefer you just come in here." Ciel called over his shoulder, having sensed the two servants presence.

Nelson and Elen came inside, rather stunned that Ciel was inviting them so casually to observe.

As the two player avatars came out on the other side of the portal the name: 'Capra Demon' with an enormous health bar underneath appeared at the bottom of the screen.

http://soulslore.wdfiles.com/local--resi...
134212113.title: Other

1342121131.content:
Trevor took a deep breath. "Ok the room is used to the demon's advantage, make sure to be careful or we won't have a chance to recover."

Ciel flexed his fingers smirking. "I'll keep that in mind Trevor. Now let's slay this boss."

Nelson and Elen watched in awe as the two intensely looked at the screen and began quickly moving their thumbs and fingers. A heavy tension filled the air as the demon waved it's blade and struck the two.

"Damn, Quick to the stairs!", Trevor shouted as their health drained.

"The stairs?", Ciel glanced questionably at Trevor with his left eye, regretting it as he was a second late in dodging.

"We can recover HP and the Capra Demon can't get passed the low railing!"

"So intense!", the two servents sweatdropped at the emergence of Ciel and Trevor into the game.

Now on the stairs and out of reach Trevor smirked. "Alright quick use firebombs!" Unloading bomb after bomb before the demon's recovery time had it down.

Ciel almost bit his tongue as he clenched his teeth, if this boss was defeated he'd feel more then enough accomplishment.

Soon....
1342121131.title: Boss Battle

1343.content:
Cardcaptor Sakura and Amahara-kun +.

Eriol deciding to have some fun with his cute little descendant, Syaoran Li. Eriol decide to send Syaoran into a manga that would embarrass Syaoran.
1343.title: Other

13431.content:
Syaoran was walking around town, he just enter his first year of highschool. Sakura was busy hanging out with Tomoyo, so he had nothing else to do.

Eriol smirk, as she stalker Syaoran. He loved playing pranks on him, and today he come up with his best one yet. He was going to send Syaoran into a manga, he even chose the perfect one.

Now he just needed to get Syaoran need the book and his magic will do the rest.

Syaoran say a new manga store, it was having a sell. He shrugged his he enter the store.

Eriol grinned, just wait Syaoran you will have the time of your life. Eriol thought, as he smirk.

He follow Syaoran to the store, with the special manga in hand. The store was crowed, this made it easier to sneak up on Syaoran. Eriol made is way behind Syaoran, he bump into him.

Syaoran felt someone bumped into him, then he noticed a manga on the floor. He picked it up, he looked at it.

It had a cute blond girl on the front, she was wearing a school uniform.

He Reed the title, Amahara-kun plus.

He never heard of the title, he looked for the person who bump into him. He or she must have dropped it.

Then suddenly Syaoran felt dizzy, he tried to stay focus. As the world spined around him, he lost concious.

Syaoran had a headache, he slowly opened his eyes. He was no longer in the manga store, but in a park.
Syaoran jumper up, he looked around. How did he get, something happen mad he needed to figure it out.

" Hello there." Said a girlish voice behind him.

Syaoran turned around, he was shocked. The girl from the manga cover was standing right in front of him.

" My name is Yukino Amahara, what's your ?" Asked Amahara, with a smile.

Syaoran was confuse, was he in the manga. Someone had teleported him into this manga, but why. This manga didn't seem to having anything strange about it.

" Syaoran Li." Said Syaoran, looking at Amahara.

" What a cute name for a cute boy." Said Amahara, with a smirk.

This made Syaoran blushed, Amahara seems nice.

" Do you have any plans for today ?" Asked Amahara, smiling at Syaoran.

Syaoran gulped, " No, but..." Syaoran didn't get to finish his words.

" Great, follow me." Said Amahara, as she grabbed Syaoran's arm.

Syaoran was surprised how strong her grip was. Also how fast she was, he had no clue where she was taking him.

Where does Amahara take Syaoran ?
13431.title: Cardcaptor Sakura and Amahara-kun plus

134311.content:
Soon the arrived at a water park called, Typhoon Springs. Syaoran was a little confused, " Why are we here ?" Asked Syaoran, Amahara smirk at him.

" To have fun, Syaoran." Giggled Amahara, Syaoran blushed. He imagined Amahara in a bikini, she would look cute.

" I don't have a swimsuit." Said Syaoran, Amahara smiled at him.

" Don't worry, they sell them and I will buy you one." Said Amahara, as he grabbed Syaoran and dragged him into the park.

Amahara lead Syaoran to the locker/dressing rooms, he told Syaoran to pick a room. Syaoran sighed, as he enter one.

He pulled the curtain closed, the room was small. He saw a small basket, there was a tag on it. ' Put all Clothes in Here' said the tag. Syaoran blushed as he undressed completely, he put all of his clothes in the basket.

He waited for Amahara, Syaoran hoped she would return soon. Syaoran heard footsteps coming,
" Syaoran have you put all of your clothes in the basket ?" Asked Amahara, Syaoran said yes.

He was curious on why she asked, then Syaoran noticed an arm under the curtain and it grabbed the basket and pulled it out.

Syaoran was stunned, " Don't worry Syaoran, I will put all of your stuff in a locker." Said Amahara, Syaoran felt embarrass. He was completely naked and a girl just took all of his clothes.

Then after a minute a basket was slid into the dressing room, Syaoran sighed in relief. He looked into basket and he blushed, inside was a....
134311.title: A water park

1343111.content:
Syaoran's jaw dropped, it was a green one piece girl swimsuit. Why had Amahara give him this, it had to be a mistake.

" Amahara this is a girl swimsuit." Said Syaoran, he heard Amahara giggled.

" Sorry, but they where all out of trunks, would you perfer a bikini." Said Amahara, Syaoran sighed.

" Now put it on, or do want go skinning dipping. " Said Amahara, with a giggle. Syaoran blushed at the thought.

Syaoran put on the one piece, looking into a mirror, it wasn't as bad as he thought.

The curtain was pulled back, Syaoran blushed at what he saw. Amahara was in a cute pink one piece too.

" Do I look cute ?" Asked Amahara, winking at him.

Syaoran nodded, Amahara smiled and grabbed his arm.

Amahara dragged Syaoran out of the locker room. He felt embarrass walking around in a girl swimsuit.

Where does Amahara take Syaoran ?
1343111.title: A green one piece

info.description:
Have you ever wondered what your favorite fandoms would be like if they were crossed over with one another? What if Edward Elric got sucked into Gotham City? What if the Straw Hats ran into Jack Sparrow?!

These possibilities and more are available in limitless iterations in this interactive!!
